channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP CRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP CRM

item.title: CVE-2018-2380|2024-08-05T04:14:39.708Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crm
item.description: SAP CRM, 7.01, 7.02,7.30, 7.31, 7.33, 7.54, allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by users, thus characters representing "traverse to parent directory" are passed through to the file APIs.
